command.name: Identify
command.description: Use AI to identify the programming language of the given piece of code.

message.name: Identify Code
message.description: Use AI to identify the programming language of any code within a message.

code.name: Code
code.long: The code provided is too long, please try again with a shorter piece of code.
code.missing: There is no code to identify, please try again with a piece of code.

file.name: File
file.description: Upload a file, its contents language will be identified.
file.large: The file you uploaded was too large, please try again with a smaller file.

prediction.name: Prediction
prediction.unknown: Could not identify this code's language, either there isn't enough information or it just doesn't exist.
